content:
a) What is difference between BS-2 and BS-3 engine?
b) What is the reason for emitting the white exhaust smoke during start of the vehicle? how will you prevent this?
c) what is DTSI? why this technology is used in motor bikes?
d) What is pan hard rod or track bar?
e) What is the calorific value and what is the calorific value of petrol?
f) What is ant locking braking System?
g) What is Air-Fuel ratio and if the spark plug deposits black soot, what does it indicate>
h) Define firing order and what is the firing order of an opposed four cylinder IC engine?
i) What is the basic purpose of four wheel drive system?
j) why automobile tires are black in color? is there anything related with heat conduction?
